data.title: Historical Overview of Paleoanthropological Research
data.meta_description: This chapter provides a comprehensive scientific historical overview of paleoanthropology as a multifaceted biological discipline. A brief summary of pre-Darwinian theories of evolution is followed by a historical report of the paradigmatic change wrought by...
